infos.value: Leonis Castle will soon be in sight.
Little Leela, could you remind me of the state of Hourne?
Yes!
Excuse me, Grandma, coming through.
...H-hey, just who are you referring to?
Who indeed, tee hee!
I've heard there are still those in Hourne who do not think too kindly of us...
That would be Engelbert, commander of the first division, «Solidus».
Engelbert...
He's got a short temper and no ears for the words of others.
Him and Schuzelt seem to be on pretty good terms, though...
Hmm, I see.
Which means that if he discovers we left Schuzelt behind in Wezette Castle...
Th-that would be bad.
Ovis is hopeful that Leonis and Hourne join as allies.
Ah... This is a mess...
Engelbert's as stubborn as his shield is thick.
Nonetheless, felling the Lion's Den would be no easy feat without our help.
It makes me wonder just how much King Robb is relying on this little brigade of ours...
Though it would be nice to jump in and save the day.
...Lord Mont?
Fennes is approaching.
There looks to be warrior monks in their midst as well.
Which means...we'll be joining up with Hourne soon enough.
...Let's go!
Right!
Machérie... Hold on!
